chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is experiencing the following problem:
Is it possible to expedite my order as soon as possible? This is a very important gift
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

Where is the shipment of the customer’s package, please ?

Regards,
Marry from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm the customer's address?

Your satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Hello,
My iPhone 12 is having the following problem:
Hello, the order should have left yesterday, do you have any news please? This is delaying everything...
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

Matthieu INGOLD
53 rue joseph depierre 68700 Cernay, FRANCE.
0780057556

Regards,

Marry from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare,

The order is currently being shipped under the tracking number GH202902635JB. Here is the tracking link:
https://www.chronopost.fr/tracking-no-cms/suivi-page?listeNumerosLT=GH202902635JB&langue=fr_FR

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
